pages.name: login
pages.title: Welcome to ADAPT, the Accessible Data Analysis and Publishing Tool.

loginContent.metaDescription: A freely available tool for reporting IDEA data, fully accessible to individuals with disabilities.
loginContent.subtitle: Developed by the Rhonda Weiss Center for Accessible IDEA Data, ADAPT is a collaborative, web-based solution that allows users to develop data products accessible to all, including people with disabilities. By increasing data accessibility, ADAPT promotes broader data use by more diverse individuals, leading to improved decision-making and educational outcomes.
loginContent.passwordHint: It must be a combination of minimum 8 letters, numbers, and symbols.

pages.title: Footer Links
pages.description: To customize what links show up in your footer, click the edit button and you will be able to create and update the footer links.

sections.name: links
sections.description: Configure your footer links.
sections.instructions:
You can name the link with the Link Label field, and add a URL in the Link URL field. You may also select if it is an External Link by selecting the box, and then you can specify how the link should open (e.g., new tab or same tab). You can also assign an icon to the link by copying an icon class from https://fontawesome.com/v5/searchopens in new tab and pasting it in the Link Icon field. If you need to add additional fields, you can select the Add Footer Links button, or you may save your changes by selecting the Save button.

If you do not include both a label and a URL, the link will not be displayed in the footer.
